_source.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.
_source.long_desc: Developed by school owners, for school owners, iClassPro is the worlds best online class management software solution for class-based businesses. A subscription to iClassPro includes features for class and camp schedule, enrollment tracking, communications, accounts receivable, online registration, reporting and more. iClassPro has an amazing support team is available to help every step of the way.
_source.pricing_details: iClassPro offers a free trial for 30 days, after which the software is available at $129 per month per location.
_source.target_audience: Recreational class businesses use iClassPro to streamline daily activities, offer online registration, improve communications and boost productivity in the workplace.

related_products.short_desc: Free employee attendance tracker for unlimited number of people, and options for role assignment, permissions and data reporting.
related_products.features: In search of a simple attendance tracking software? Try Clockify - a time tracking tool helping you see who was present, when, what they worked on and for how long. Attendance is monitored by simply starting and stopping the timer - for each activity or the whole working day. Invite an unlimited number of people to track attendance, assign them roles and give permissions. Extract data on each working week, see who worked on what and for how long to optimize working schedules.

related_products.short_desc: A simple and affordable solution for capturing employee time to run payroll, invoice clients and manage productivity.
related_products.features: Time Tracker by eBillity is a timekeeping application for business teams of all sizes. A simple and affordable solution for capturing employee time to run payroll, invoice clients and manage productivity. With flexible time tracking options and customizable settings you can easily manage your employees hours in every situation; start a timer from any device, clock-in on arrival at work, add time in blocks using the weekly timesheet or create and share the schedule with your team.

related_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
related_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce

related_products.short_desc: Rippling makes it easy to manage your Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform.
related_products.features:
Rippling makes it easy to manage your company's Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform. It brings all of your employee systems and data together, and helps automate your busy work.

Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button, and in 90 seconds set up a new hires payroll, health insurance, 401K, work computer, and apps  like Slack, Zoom, and Office 365.

related_products.short_desc: Paychex Flex Time is the attendance tracking system you want to explore.  Real-time access to your labor costs and more. 3 months free.
related_products.features: Paychex makes time and attendance tracking simple.  Having real-time access to your labor costs can help you control them ? so you can drive increases in savings, output, and performance.  Get 3 months of free payroll for a limited time.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, time tracking, and communication tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!
related_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants improve efficiency with intuitive scheduling, time tracking, communication, and compliance tools. The intuitive 7punches app integrates right into your schedule to manage time and attendance, reduce compliance risks, and improve employee accountability. The easy drag-and-drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. Start free today!

related_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

related_products.short_desc: Zenefits Time & Attendance - the easiest way to track & manage hourly employees.
related_products.features: Zenefits makes employee time-tracking simple. Employees can log their time from any device and employers can approve time submissions in seconds. Our software can also sync employee hours directly to payroll and help ensure time-related compliance.

related_products.short_desc: The BEST Workforce Management, HR & Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime etc
related_products.features: UKG/Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: Timesheets that simplify payroll & billing for small business. Free trial includes timesheets, expenses, and HR. Try timesheets today.
related_products.features: Timesheets.com tracks your employee, contractors, and even student time with ease. From the Dashboard you can see who's on the clock and who's taking time off. You can view any user's timesheet and access their hours and, if applicable, expense receipts. You can also edit timesheets, approve edits, and review time off requests. Your employees can enter attendance or time spent by project using the real-time punch or by entering time using the week calendar on any device. Try us free today!

similar_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
similar_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce

similar_products.short_desc: Say goodbye to tedious attendance tracking with Time-Off, an industry-leading solution for tracking PTO and other leave types.
similar_products.features: Say goodbye to tedious attendance tracking with Time-Off, flexible and affordable leave management for your small to medium-sized business. This industry-leading platform from PurelyHR gives you the tools for time-off transparency by automating accruals, policy renewals, and offering a simple request and approval process to free yourself from the cycle of emails, spreadsheets, and paper calendars. Get started today with a free 21-day trial or a live demo.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate time off tracking and accruals with a self-service system configured precisely to your needs.  Access via web and mobile app.
similar_products.features: Simplify paid time off tracking throughout any organization with web-based, fully configurable absence management. TimeOut vacation tracking automates processes and eliminates errors from requesting, approving and tracking time out of the office to automatically updating accruals.  Access via web and mobile app. Our customers range from small (under 20 employees) to enterprise (over 10,000 employees).

similar_products.short_desc: Paychex Flex Time is the attendance tracking system you want to explore.  Real-time access to your labor costs and more. 3 months free.
similar_products.features: Paychex makes time and attendance tracking simple.  Having real-time access to your labor costs can help you control them ? so you can drive increases in savings, output, and performance.  Get 3 months of free payroll for a limited time.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, yet "Simple and Easy to Use", our time and attendance solutions streamlines your workforce management and payroll processing.
similar_products.features: "Simple and Easy to Use". Touchless, Mask Detection & Temperature Check Clocks, RFID, Biometrics, Tablets & Smartphones. Integrated time tracking with GPS features, schedules, job costing, expense and time off tracking through the ITCS-WebClock. Easily integrates with payroll and financial systems. Using Cloud & High Availability technology data is secure. Highly configurable and customization is available.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based employee time clock system for small businesses to track employees' time and generate accurate time cards for payroll.
similar_products.features:
OnTheClock is a time tracking and employee scheduling software with
over 15,000 companies who trust and rely on our robust features:
*Mobile app available
*PTO tracking
*Employee shift scheduling 
*Time card editing 
*Overtime calculation 
*Geofencing & GPS 
*IP and device restrictions  
*Biometric/Fingerprint option
*Payroll integration
*Paid breaks 
*Reminders 
*Automatic break deduction options
*Tips, bonuses and commissions 
*Job and Project costing
*$2.70/employee per month

similar_products.short_desc: Automated timesheet system that interfaces with other payroll, accounting, or billing systems. Start your 1 month free trial today!
similar_products.features: Simple, yet powerful compliant timesheets with unlimited customer support. Track time anywhere using a computer, tablet or phone with manual timesheet or clockin/clockout. Easily integrate with your payroll such as QuickBooks, ADP, Paychex and much more. Never fear a government audit again, our DCAA compliant timesheet system was built with government contractors in mind and has been battle-tested for compliance rules and regulations for over 2 decades. Start your 1 month free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: TCP's TimeClock Plus software allows managers to track employee attendance and a host of schedule-related options.
similar_products.features: TimeClock Plus allows managers to track employee attendance and a host of schedule-related options. We offer an Occurrences feature that can track schedule-related occurrences, tally a point system, and even notify managers at a specific threshold. Our solution is made to equip managers to ensure their employees are on-time and efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage employee attendance quickly and affordably with this web-based app. Easily track sick, personal, and vacation days.
similar_products.features: Spot troubling attendance patterns at a glance from any computer, anywhere! This web-based app designed for small businesses allows you to quickly track and manage employee attendance. Using a simple coding system, you track missed days and tardies with the reason the employee is out of the office. Plus, there are designated sections for tracking sick time and vacation days, as well as notes. Best of all, the price is only $90 a year. Its the easiest, most affordable solution available.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud based time and attendance solution that can be used on computers, tablets, or mobile.  Request and approve PTO from anywhere.
similar_products.features: Buddy Punch is an easy to use, cloud-based time and attendance tracking solution including: PTO tracking, punch clock, and a scheduler. Our intuitive drag-and-drop interface allows you to create and publish schedules and have employees view and punch into their scheduled time. Employees can request PTO which you can approve and everyone can view on their calendar. We also integrate with payroll providers and offer free iOS and Android apps. Get started with our free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Verint Workforce Management can help you track and manage employee attendance through its adherence capabilities.
similar_products.features: Verint Workforce Management (WFM) can be used to track and manage employee attendance. Adherence capabilities not only track attendance, but also provide the ability to utilize detailed schedule activity data to account for the employee's daily activities. These adherence features can also be used to assist with automating timecard/payroll tracking for employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Clock software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Clock tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Clock software, also known as timesheet software, automates the tracking of employee attendance, scheduling, and vacations. Time Clock software gives organizations an overall picture of how employees spend their time as well as an analysis of labor costs on a per project basis. Time Clock software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Time Clock software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.
